sentence.text: B1 induced readthrough at all three nonsense codons in cultured cancer cells with li>TP53 (tumor protein p53) mutations, in cells from patients with nonsense mutations in the li>TPP1 (tripeptidyl peptidase 1), li>DMD (dystrophin), li>SMARCAL1 (SWI/SNF-related, matrix-associated, actin-dependent regulator of chromatin, subfamily a-like 1), and li>COL7A1 (collagen type VII alpha 1 chain) genes, and in an in vivo tumor xenograft model.
